articles.title: Army-People Rallies Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Army-People Rallies Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies are going on to support the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The rallies were held in North Phyongan and South Hwanghae provinces on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were officials of the local party, armed forces and power organs and working people's organizations, service persons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					 The statement of a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command was read out at the rallies by Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Pak Yong Ho, chief secretary of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, respectively.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers said the statement of a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command was an expression of the steadfast faith of the army and people of the DPRK to finally settle accounts with those who infringe upon its independent dignity.
					
					 Branding the U.S. as the arch criminal which compelled the DPRK to conduct the underground nuclear test for self-defence, they bitterly denounced the U.S. for wantonly violating the legitimate right of a sovereign state to launch a satellite and kicking up a highhanded campaign to stifle the DPRK, straining the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 It is the final conclusion and will of the DPRK to settle accounts with the U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, with arms only, they said, noting that all the service personnel and people are fully ready to fight a decisive battle with the enemy.
					
					 They called for resolutely shattering the reckless war moves of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces and accomplishing the historic cause of national reunification, rallied close around the great party as firm as a rock.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Enemy Not to Repeat History of Disgraceful Fiasco
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Enemy Not to Repeat History of Disgraceful Fiasco 
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' moves to ignite a war against the DPRK are so foolish an option as repeating the history of their miserable fiasco, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills are their premeditated saber-rattling to ignite the second Korean war by straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase under the pretext of the DPRK's exercise of its sovereign right.
					
					 The aggressor forces of injustice are fated to meet their destruction. In the 1950s the U.S. imperialists perpetrated a surprise armed invasion against the young DPRK by mobilizing the Syngman Rhee puppet clique and even mercenaries of satellite countries. However, the aggressors suffered a miserable defeat in face of the heroic struggle waged by the army and the people of the DPRK all out in the sacred war of justice.
					
					 The U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo incident and large spy plane EC-121 incident which took place against the backdrop of ceaseless military provocations of warmongers in the post-war period ended in the surrender of the U.S.
					
					 In the 1990s the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces worked hard to ignite a war against the DPRK while talking about unreasonable "nuclear inspection". But the enemies were hard hit by the DPRK's solemn proclamation of a semi-war state and its statement declaring the withdrawal from the NPT.
					
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. signed the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework and the U.S. president sent even a message of assurances to the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a country manufacturing and launching satellites and a political and military power possessed of nuclear deterrent. It includes a high level of smaller, light and diverse A-bombs.
					
					 Oblivious of the historic lesson, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are seeking to ignite a war against the DPRK again. This, however, will lead to a final destruction.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it feels easy as it is situated across the ocean. The sacred war for the country's reunification to be waged by the army and the people of the DPRK will be quite different from the Korean war fought in the 1950s.
					
					  The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces would be well advised to clearly understand that their on-going war maneuvers are as foolish actions as repeating the history of their disgraceful defeat.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Decisively Frustrating US Hostile Actions against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Decisively Frustrating US Hostile Actions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will counter the high-handed acts of the hostile forces with toughest counteractions and their additional hostile action with unimaginable second and third physical countermeasures and all the service personnel and people will dynamically come out in the all-out action to greet a great event of national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 It is the U.S. imperialists' trite method of aggression to tighten sanctions and escalate the moves to stifle the DPRK militarily.
					
					 When the Korean people were dynamically hastening the rehabilitation and construction after winning a victory in the past Fatherland Liberation War, the U.S. imperialists kicked up a noisy war racket, claiming that the DPRK would not stand to its feet in 100 years. The Korean people, however, steadily advanced the revolution and construction, each holding a rifle in one hand and a hammer or sickle in the other, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and defence upbuilding.
					
					 In the wake of the demise of the Cold War in the 1990s and the upsetting of balance of forces, the upbeat U.S. imperialists stepped up the sanctions and blockade campaign against the DPRK, fortress of socialism.
					
					 But, the enemies were utterly ignorant of the Korean people.
					
					 It was the revolutionary will of the Korean people that they could never abandon their faith even though they might collapse because of hunger.
					
					 The imperialists are foolish enough to calculate that the Korean people would yield to their sanctions.
					
					 The DPRK will neither recognize all the "resolutions on sanctions" unjustly adopted at the UN Security Council nor make any switchover in its option.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers had better stop their rash acts. The army and people of the DPRK will never allow them to infringe upon its right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes and sovereignty.
					
					 They will show the U.S. imperialists what a real war is like and surely achieve a final victory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Warmongers' Extreme War Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Warmongers' Extreme War Hysteria
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Traitor Kim Kwan Jin, south Korean puppet Defense Minister, went to the 2nd Division of the Marine Corps some days ago and cried out for "immediate punishment," asserting "the north may make provocation anytime". Traitor Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff, blustered aboard an escort ship of the second fleet of the puppet navy that "the enemy is sure to provoke" and "it is, therefore, important to win on spot in case of provocation" and "it is necessary to punish" someone "so that he may deeply regret."
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a shriek made by those who are taken aback by the spirit of the army and people of the DPRK who have risen up as one in an all-out action for a final victory and a revelation of their consciousness of the indelible crimes committed by them.
					
					 The tough-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is attributable to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces which are kicking up high-handed "sanctions" and military pressure campaigns against the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for self-defence.
					
					 The hysteria of the south Korean warmongers has reached its extreme phase.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo's reckless hysteria clearly proves that the group of traitors is seeking to lead the on-going joint military exercises in south Korea to a real war against the north in league with the U.S.
					
					 Their persistent anti-DPRK confrontation to prolong their remaining days is only touching off bitterer hatred and resentment among all fellow countrymen.
					
					 A war is not fought through a word play.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will make puppies ignorant of a real war have a bitter taste of the sacred war of Korean style, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean War Maniac's Drumbeats
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean War Maniac's Drumbeats
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Hyon, director of the Operation Department of the south Korean puppet Joint Chief of Staff, at a press conference on March 6 threatened that the south "would mete out a strong and resolute punishment even to commanding forces in case of provocation", describing the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army as a "threat of military provocation". He went the lengths of "serving a warning" to someone.
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This can never be overlooked as it is deliberate invectives extremely getting on the nerves of the army and people of the DPRK and insulting them.
					
					 Kim made desperate efforts to blame the DPRK for "provocations" but such sophism does not work on it.
					
					 Even at this moment, at least 200 000 U.S. forces and south Korean puppet forces enough to fight a war  are busy staging the frantic Foal Eagle joint military exercises against the DPRK in the sky, land and seas of south Korea with various type nuclear strike means involved. This being a hard reality, they are holding the DPRK accountable for "provocation" just like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The deliberate accusation made by Kim against the DPRK over the statement issued by a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command only indicated that he is just the same imbecile as the worst war maniacs like Kim Kwan Jin, puppet Defense Minister, and Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff.
					
					 Kim Yong Hon was so ridiculous as to cry out for "meting out a resolute punishment" to the DPRK. He must have forgot the Yonphyong Island shelling incident in which south Korean forces were hit hard for preempting their shelling, seized with war fever.
					
					 The day is sure to come before long when war maniacs will experience the fatal consequences to be entailed by their invectives, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Statement of KPA Supreme Command Favored by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Statement of KPA Supreme Command Favored by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China on March 6 issued a statement in support of the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 Upon receiving a statement of spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command, all the Koreans in China are simmering with burning hatred for the brigandish U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet are making last-ditch efforts with bloodshot eyes to tighten "sanctions" against the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson taught by the DPRK's third underground nuclear test conducted as part of its practical countermeasures.
					
					 They kicked off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises on March 1 by mobilizing huge armed forces of aggression.
					
					They are the most dangerous nuclear war racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet military group is busy inspecting units to unhesitatingly cry out for making preemptive strike.
					
					 The DPRK will take the second and third strong practical counteractions in succession to cope with the high-handed war acts of the U.S. and all other hostile forces as it had already declared. 
					
					  Now that the U.S. seeks to attack the DPRK even with nuclear weapons, it will counter them with diversified precision nuclear strike means of Korean style.
					
					 The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China and all Koreans in China will join all service personnel and people in the homeland who have risen up as one, having the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at the helm of the revolution, in the struggle to resolutely shatter the nuclear war moves of the enemies and certainly achieve the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Censured by Korean in China
articles.content:
Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Censured by Korean in China
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Han Kil Su, director of the Information Department of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement titled "Koreans will blow up strongholds of aggressors and bring earlier the sacred cause of national reunification" on March 6.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces described the joint military exercises as "annual and defensive ones" but the saber-rattling is typical war maneuvers and military drills for a nuclear war against the DPRK from A to Z. It is reckless war hysteria to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK and ignite an all-out war against it and a blatant challenge to the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 A spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army in a statement declared the resolute stand that it would counter enemies coming in attack with a dagger with a sword, a rifle with an artillery piece and nukes with precision nuclear strike means of Korean style more powerful than them and thus blow up the strongholds of aggression of the hostile forces.
					
					 No force on earth can block the army and people of the DPRK from advancing under the wise leadership of the great brilliant Songun commander.
					
					 The association and all Koreans in China will join the people in the homeland in blowing up the strongholds of aggressors and bring earlier the great cause of national reunification if the U.S. imperialists and their followers dare ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet by Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was posted on the website by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Mar. 4.
					 The work, published on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), lays bare the reactionary nature and absurdity of sophistry let loose by the imperialists and renegades of socialism slandering socialism as "totalitarian", "barrack-like" and "administrative and commanding".
					
					 It also clarifies the principled issues arising in defending the cause of socialism and accomplishing it such as the issues of regarding socialism as faith, putting it on a moral basis and giving full play to its advantages.

articles.title: All Steps of DPRK Favored by World Progressives
articles.content:
All Steps of DPRK Favored by World Progressives
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese newspaper Hangk on Feb. 27 carried an article titled "DPRK's nuclear test to be observed from new angle".
					 The newspaper said the DPRK's successful satellite launch in December last year and its third underground nuclear test on Feb. 12 make the world look at it from a new angle, adding:
					
					 The DPRK's third underground nuclear test that stunned the world was a message to the UN Security Council and the U.S. which have adopted only unfair resolutions on it.
					
					 Had the U.S. put an end to its hostile policy toward the DPRK and treated it as a friendly state, it would have taken no such tough measure.
					
					 The U.S. forces' permanent presence in south Korea and Japan, their ceaseless joint war drills, economic sanctions, etc. were the main factor that prevented the DPRK from exercising its self-restraint.
					
					 At a time when the DPRK was striving to develop its economy and improve the people's living standard, the U.S. and its followers hamstrung its efforts and violated its sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK took measures to safeguard its sovereignty by itself despite repeated interference and pressure, winning praises from the world progressives.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the DPRK's nuclear test was a product of the repeated pressure and violation of its sovereignty by the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The U.S. and other Western countries, south Korea and Japan should make efforts for lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula, though belatedly.

articles.title: Signature Campaign for Solidarity with DPRK Launched in Pakistan
articles.content:
Signature Campaign for Solidarity with DPRK Launched in Pakistan
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of kicking off a signature campaign for solidarity with the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea took place in Pakistan on Feb. 24.
					A report by the secretary general of the Karachi branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association was followed by speeches of the general secretary of the Pakistan National Federation of Trade Unions, the general secretary of the Sind State Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party and others. 
					
					The reporter and speakers said that the U.S. forces in south Korea are disturbers of peace, the main stumbling block lying in the way of Korea's reunification and a constant source of a new war on the Korean Peninsula as they have imposed all sorts of misfortune and pain upon the Korean people. 
					
					They urged the U.S. to withdraw its forces and nukes from south Korea at once and replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty. 
					
					They denounced all the moves against the implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it. They demanded the U.S. let the Korean people reunify their country in line with their aspiration and will. 
					
					They expressed the expectation that the Korean people would achieve bigger successes in the struggle for national reunification under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The participants signed the signature in solidarity with the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
